Control.name: lc_enable
Control.desc: enable signal for local contrast enhancement, 1-enable; 0 disable

Control.name: lc_blkblend_mode
Control.desc: use bilinear interpolation between blocks, 0: no interpolation 1: blender enabled

Control.name: lc_blk_hnum
Control.desc: lc processing region number of H, maximum to(STA_LEN_H-1)(0~12)

Control.name: lc_blk_vnum
Control.desc: lc processing region number of V, maximum to (STA_LEN_V-1)(0~8)

Control.name: lc_curve_nodes_hlpf
Control.desc: horizontal lpf of the ram_curve_nodes, 0: no LPF, 1= [1 2 1]; 2: [1 2 2 2 1]/8

Control.name: lc_curve_nodes_vlpf
Control.desc: Vertical lpf of the ram_curve_nodes, 0: no LPF, 1= [1 2 1]; 2: [1 2 2 2 1]/8

Control.name: lc_hblank
Control.desc: blank between two line.

Control.name: lcinput_ysel
Control.desc: reg_lcinput_ysel:luma input options 0: org_y; 1: gau_y; 2: gauadp_y; 3: edgadplpf_y; 4: nr_y;5: lti_y; 6: pk_y (before os);7: pk_y (after os).

Control.name: lcinput_csel
Control.desc: reg_lcinput_csel:chroma input options 0: org_c; 1: gau_c; 2: gauadp_c; 3: edgadplpf_c; 4: nr_c;5: cti_c; 6: pk_c.

Control.name: lc_slope_min
Control.desc: reg_lc_ypkbv_slope_lmt_0: min slop for the curves to avoid artifacts,norm 32 to 1

Control.name: lc_slope_max
Control.desc: reg_lc_ypkbv_slope_lmt_1: max slop for the curves to avoid artifacts, norm 32 to 1

Control.name: lc_slope_max_face
Control.desc: reg_lc_slope_max_face: maximum slope for the pkBin-maxBV range curve to do face protection, norm 32 to 1

Control.name: lmtrat_minmax
Control.desc: x/1024 of amount

Control.name: lmtrat_valid
Control.desc: x/1024 of amount

Control.name: lc_num_m_coring
Control.desc: coring to num_m, soft coring

Control.name: lc_cntst_gain_low
Control.desc: reg_lc_contrast_low: contrast gain to the lc for dark side

Control.name: lc_cntst_scale_low
Control.desc: reg_lc_cntstscl_low: scale for the contrast low, norm 8 as 1

Control.name: lc_cntstbvn_low
Control.desc: scale to num_m as limit of min_val to minBV distance, to protect mono-color

Control.name: lc_cntst_lmt_low_l
Control.desc: reg_lc_cntstlmt_low_0: limit for the contrast low

Control.name: lc_cntst_lmt_low_h
Control.desc: reg_lc_cntstlmt_low_1: limit for the contrast low

Control.name: lc_cntst_gain_hig
Control.desc: reg_lc_contrast_hig: contrast gain to the lc for bright side

Control.name: lc_cntst_scale_hig
Control.desc: reg_lc_cntstscl_hig: scale for the contrast high,norm 8 as 1

Control.name: lc_cntstbvn_hig
Control.desc: scale to num_m as limit of max_val to maxBV distance, to protect mono-color

Control.name: lc_cntst_lmt_hig_l
Control.desc: reg_lc_cntstlmt_high_0: limit for the contrast high

Control.name: lc_cntst_lmt_hig_h
Control.desc: reg_lc_cntstlmt_high_1: limit for the contrast high
